content:
In the Cherkasy region, as a result of the rocket firing of the Russian Federation, there is a hit on the object of energy infrastructure.

About thisreportedHead of Cherkasy Ova Igor Taburets.

“All services are on the ground. Work on elimination of consequences is ongoing, ”the message reads.

According to preliminary information, the Air Force forces destroyed 6 "Shahamed" over the Cherkasy region.

Due to the fall of the debris, the non -residential premises were destroyed, and the windows in a private household were also released. People were not injured.

In addition, our defenders knocked out the winged rocket in the Uman region. In this case, it took place without consequences.

As reported by Armyinform, Air Defense ForcesDestroyedThere are 24 air purposes above the Dnipropetrovsk region.
title: In Cherkasy region, the rocket stroke of the Russian Federation damaged the object of energy infrastructure

author: Army Inform
